name: Ashutosh Sharma
summary: Cloud and DevOps Engineer with strong development experience, skilled in building, automating, and deploying scalable systems using AWS, Terraform, Kubernetes, and Golang. Over seven years of Linux experience with a solid foundation in both software development and cloud infrastructure. Passionate about automation, CI/CD, and secure design.
career_goal: To build scalable, automated, and secure cloud infrastructures while contributing to high-impact DevOps and software engineering teams.

experience.title: Cloud / DevOps Engineer (Co-op)
highlights: Containerized over 40 AWS Lambda functions using Python and Node.js, migrating from ZIP to ECR container images.
Built reusable Terraform modules for AWS CodeBuild and CodePipeline to automate Docker image builds and deployments.
Integrated Slack notifications via SNS for build and deployment alerts.
Refined IAM policies for least privilege and alias-based Lambda roles.
Collaborated in Agile workflows with daily stand-ups and Confluence documentation.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
highlights: Developed enterprise web applications using React.js, C#, Entity Framework, and MSSQL.
Built business process automation workflows using Creatio and custom backend APIs.
Managed on-premises and Azure cloud deployments using Docker and Kubernetes.
Configured IIS, Apache, and NGINX servers for hosting and scaling applications.
Collaborated across teams to enhance CI/CD pipelines and improve release reliability.
Contributed to both development and DevOps efforts, improving performance and reliability.

projects.name: PharmaKart
projects.description: Online pharmacy e-commerce platform built with a Go microservices architecture.
details: Go (Gin + gRPC) microservices for authentication, product, order, payment, reminder, and gateway services.
Infrastructure as Code using Terraform modules for VPC, EKS, ECS, RDS, and S3.
CI/CD with AWS CodeBuild, CodePipeline, and GitHub Actions to automate Docker builds and ECR deployments.
Stripe payment integration and SNS/SQS reminder service with CloudWatch monitoring.
Frontend built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and ShadCN UI.

projects.name: Aayo
projects.description: Real-time multiplayer quiz platform similar to Kahoot.
details: Backend in Go (Gin + WebSocket hub + JWT authentication).
Supports CSV/ZIP quiz upload with image processing, real-time scoring, and leaderboards.
Frontend built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, ShadCN UI, and Framer Motion animations.
Implemented GitHub Actions workflows for backend and frontend CI/CD pipelines with Docker image builds.
Planned mobile app port using Flutter or React Native.

projects.name: Automation & Scripting Toolkit
projects.description: Collection of automation scripts and workflows designed to streamline development and deployment pipelines.
details: Developed Bash and Python scripts for automating repetitive DevOps tasks such as environment setup, log collection, and deployment validation.
Created n8n automation workflows for CI/CD notifications, repository synchronization, and cloud event handling.
Used GitHub Actions and AWS CLI to trigger automated build, deploy, and clean-up operations across environments.
Improved developer productivity and reduced manual errors by standardizing automation scripts across projects.

cloud: AWS (EKS, ECS Fargate, Lambda, RDS, S3, IAM, Secrets Manager, Parameter Store, CloudWatch, SNS, SQS, CodeBuild, CodePipeline, Route53, ACM, VPC)
